author: kukunamuniu
title: Really nice
review:
Sits on my desk next to the slightly bigger 30246 Shuttle.

It's a nice little shuttle, the build is simple but fun, and there are practically no parts that can fall off easily. The whole thing is quite sturdy.

Doesn't have the Polybag's feature of wings "locking" in expanded position nicely and could use lights on the wing tips to add some color.
